name: PickList
description: PickList is used to reorder items between different lists.

selection.label: selection
selection.title: Selected items in the list as a multidimensional array.

meta-key-selection.label: metaKeySelection
meta-key-selection.title: Defines whether metaKey is requred or not for the selection. When true metaKey needs to be pressed to select or unselect an item and when set to false selection of each item can be toggled individually. On touch enabled devices, metaKeySelection is turned off automatically.

auto-option-focus.label: autoOptionFocus
auto-option-focus.title: Whether to focus on the first visible or selected element when the overlay panel is shown.

data-key.label: dataKey
data-key.title: Name of the field that uniquely identifies the a record in the data.

list-style.label: listStyle
list-style.title: Inline style of the the list element.

responsive.label: responsive
responsive.title: Whether the list optimizes layout based on screen size.

breakpoint.label: breakpoint
breakpoint.title: The breakpoint to define the maximum width boundary when responsiveness is enabled.

striped-rows.label: stripedRows
striped-rows.title: Whether to displays rows with alternating colors.

show-source-controls.label: showSourceControls
show-source-controls.title: Whether to show buttons of source list.

show-target-controls.label: showTargetControls
show-target-controls.title: Whether to show buttons of target list.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: sourceheader
slots.title: Custom content for the component's source header.

slots.name: targetheader
slots.title: Custom content for the component's target header.

slots.name: sourcecontrolsstart
slots.title: Custom content before source control buttons.

slots.name: sourcecontrolsend
slots.title: Custom content after source control buttons.

slots.name: targetcontrolsstart
slots.title: Custom content before target control buttons.

slots.name: targetcontrolsend
slots.title: Custom content after target control buttons.

slots.name: movetotargeticon
slots.title: Custom move to target icon template.

slots.name: movealltotargeticon
slots.title: Custom move all to target icon template.

slots.name: movetosourceicon
slots.title: Custom move to source icon template.

slots.name: movealltosourceicon
slots.title: Custom move all to source icon template.

events.name: reorder
events.title: Callback to invoke when the list is reordered.

arguments.name: event.listIndex
arguments.description: Index of the list that is ordered, 0 represents the source and 1 represents the target list.

events.name: move-to-target
events.title: Callback to invoke when one or more items are moved to the target list.

events.name: move-all-to-target
events.title: Callback to invoke when all items are moved to the target list.

events.name: move-to-source
events.title: Callback to invoke when one or more items are moved to the source list.

events.name: move-all-to-source
events.title: Callback to invoke when all items are moved to the source list.

events.name: selection-change
events.title: Callback to invoke when one or more items are moved to the other list.
